div.div: Sul Ross St. vs. Mary Hardin-Baylor

tr.td: UMHB wins toss and defers, Sul Ross will receive at north end
Chad Peevey kickoff 62 yards to the SRSU8, Lee Carothers return 13 yards to the SRSU21 (Javicz Jones;Brady Engelmohr).

Scotty Walden pass incomplete to Lee Carothers.
